caption.p: : Selected plants for biofilm formation inhibitory activity. (a) Trichilia lanata (MTL). (b) Grossera vignei (MGV). (c) Acacia ataxacantha (MAA). (d) Bridelia stenocarpa (MBS). (e) Albizia ferruginea (MAF). (f) Holarrhena floribunda (MHF). (g) Triplochiton scleroxylon (MTS). (h) Anogeissus sericea (MAS).
